item.description:
Note: the Libertarian Association of Massachusetts does not support or endorse candidates for President before the national nominating convention.

Known as "Governor Veto", former Governor of New Mexico Gary Johnson is visiting Massachusetts for a fund raiser for his Libertarian campaign for President on Super Tuesday, March 6! Johnson will be on Fox News with Neil Cavuto during the 6 o'clock hour, so the fundraiser will start as soon as he can make it to the site from the TV studio.

Johnson is currently polling at 7-9% in the latest PPP three way poll against Romney and Obama. With a Ron Paul upset win unlikely for the GOP nomination, the liberty movement in Massachusetts needs to come together to support a strong Libertarian candidate. Let's carry the message of liberty forward!

The goal is to raise at least $3000 dollars from Massachusetts in order to be one of the qualifying states for presidential matching funds. The suggested donation for this event is $100 per person, but any donation will be accepted!  Bring your friends, too. Double your investment in the message of liberty: any donation from $1 to $250 will be doubled!

Intimate Fund Raising Dinner: ** There are a limited number of seats for a private dinner with Johnson following the reception. Contact blau.liberty@gmail.com by Sunday, March 4 if you are interested in attending. The price per person is $500. **

Facebook event link: http://www.facebook.c...

group.name: The Boston Area Libertarian Meetup Group

item.name: Fundraising event with Gary Johnson
